title: League won't work
body: League of legends shut down for a while due to some bugs. When it did this I was in the middle of a game and when the game was over my league crashed. I came back later and now it keeps saying I'm in a game when I'm not. Is anyone else having this issue and if so does anyone know how to resolve this issue?

replies.body: This looks like what we refer to as a "Ghost Game", which can happen during service incidents such as the one that happened last night on NA. They tend to resolve themselves after a few hours at most, so if you're still experiencing this issue, let me know.
